429.description: The request rate exceeds the current subscription limit

message.example: Current subscription only allow up to 10 requests per 60 second. Upgrade your plan or contact support for a custom one.

message.example: page.goto should be a valid url
Wrong API key provided

403.description: Account inactive | Account blocked due to unpaid invoices | Current subscription does not allow this feature

message.example: Account inactive

presignedUrl.description: S3 presigned URL to upload the document into your bucket

contentDisposition.description: The Content-Disposition header can be set to inline or attachment. If not specified, the upload proceeds without this header. When using a custom presigned URL, ensure that setting this header is supported.

isMobile.description: If meta viewport tag is taken into account

hasTouch.description: If the viewport supports touch events

isLandscape.description: If the viewport is in landscape mode

waitUntil.description: Events to wait for before rendering the document

referer.description: Referer header value. Overrides the one set by page.setExtraHTTPHeaders

url.description: url of the page to render

options.description: options passed down to Puppetter page.goTo method

waitUntil.description: Events to wait for before rendering the document

html.description: HTML encoded as BASE64 to avoid problems with characters that would break JSON

options.description: options passed down to Puppetter page.setContent method

scale.description: Scales the rendering of the page

displayHeaderFooter.description: Whether to show the header and footer

headerTemplate.description: HTML to add as header in every page of the document. Expecting base64 encoding.

footerTemplate.description: HTML to add as footer in every page of the document. Expecting base64 encoding.

landscape.description: Whether to print in landscape orientation

width.description: Width of the paper. Number or string with unit.

height.description: Height of the paper. Number or string with unit.

preferCSSPageSize.description: Give any CSS @page size declared in the page priority over what is declared in the width or height or format option.

omitBackground.description: Hides default white background and allows generating pdfs with transparency.

margin.description: Margin to apply to every page

polling.description: Function to be evaluated in browser context

timeout.description: Maximum time to wait in milliseconds

pageFunction.description: Function to be evaluated in browser context

hidden.description: (Optional) Wait for the selected element to not be found in the DOM or to be hidden, i.e. have display: none or visibility: hidden CSS properties.

timeout.description: Maximum time to wait in milliseconds

visible.description: (Optional) Wait for the selected element to be present in DOM and to be visible, i.e. to not have display: none or visibility: hidden CSS properties.

selector.description: A selector of an element to wait for

goto.description: URL source. Required if setContent is not defined

setContent.description: HTML source in base64 encoding. Required if goto is not defined

setJavaScriptEnabled.description: Enable/Disable Javascript on your page. Puppeteer default behavior is javascript enabled.

emulateMediaType.description: Changes the CSS media type of the page

setExtraHTTPHeaders.description: HTTP headers to send with every request your page initiates

pdf.description: PDF options to pass to puppeteer

setCookies.description: Cookies added to the page. Format Network.CookieParam

setLocalStorageItems.description: LocalStorage items added to the page.

waitForFunction.description: Waits for a function to finish evaluating in the page's context.

waitForSelector.description: Wait for the selector to appear in page.

setUserAgent.description: Specific user agent to use in this page

launch.description: BrowserConnectOptions to pass down to puppeteer

x.description: x-coordinate of top-left corner of clip area

y.description: y-coordinate of top-left corner of clip area

captureBeyondViewport.description: Wheter to capture the screenshot beyond the viewport or cut by the viewport size

clip.description: Defines the clipping region of the page

fullPage.description: Whether to take a screenshot of the full scrollable page

omitBackground.description: Hides default white background and allows capturing screenshots with transparency

quality.description: Image quality. Not applicable to PNG images

goto.description: URL source. Required if setContent is not defined

setContent.description: HTML source in base64 encoding. Required if goto is not defined

setJavaScriptEnabled.description: Enable/Disable Javascript on your page. Puppeteer default behavior is javascript enabled.

emulateMediaType.description: Changes the CSS media type of the page

setExtraHTTPHeaders.description: HTTP headers to send with every request your page initiates

setCookies.description: Cookies added to the page. Format Network.CookieParam

setLocalStorageItems.description: LocalStorage items added to the page.

waitForFunction.description: Waits for a function to finish evaluating in the page's context.

waitForSelector.description: Wait for the selector to appear in page.

setUserAgent.description: Specific user agent to use in this page

screenshot.description: Screenshot options to pass to puppeteer

launch.description: BrowserConnectOptions to pass down to puppeteer

headers.description: Headers to add to the webhook request

presignedUrl.description: S3 presigned URL to upload the document into your bucket

contentDisposition.description: The Content-Disposition header can be set to inline or attachment. If not specified, the upload proceeds without this header. When using a custom presigned URL, ensure that setting this header is supported.

launch.description: BrowserConnectOptions to pass down to puppeteer

requestId.description: used to identify the resulting webhook call

jobId.description: used by the support team in case of an issue

launch.description: BrowserConnectOptions to pass down to puppeteer

templateData.description: Optional data to be injected before render
